After using his [[Hydrification Technique]] to merge with a water source, Suigetsu can form a giant wave that resembles a demon-like fish. Suigetsu can use this form to battle larger opponents, or he can use it to shield allies from attack. Though it was strong enough to physically push back [[Killer B]] in his [[Tailed Beast Mode]], it was not strong enough to withstand a point-blank range [[Tailed Beast Ball]], and rendered Suigetsu unconscious soon afterwards, causing him to fall into a jelly-like state.

== Trivia ==
* Tate-eboshi is tall and straight eboshi. An {{translation|eboshi|烏帽子}} is a tall hat worn by Japanese male aristocrats since the [[wikipedia:Heian period|Heian period]].
